verses.verse: <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Together <S%G846><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> That <S%G5620><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G2453><s%> Both Of Jews <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hellenists <S%G1672><s%> A Great <S%G4183><s%> Number. <S%G4128><s%>

But <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Disobeying <S%G544><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Stirred Up <S%G1892><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made Evil Affected <S%G2559><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

<S%G2425><s%> A Long <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> They Stayed, <S%G1304><s%> Speaking Boldly, <S%G3955><s%> Confiding In <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Bore Witness <S%G3140><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> His <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> To Be Done <S%G1096><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands. <S%G5495><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4977><s%> And Was Divided <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G1161><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles. <S%G652><s%>

And <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G1161><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Rush <S%G3730><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Rulers, <S%G758><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> To Insult <S%G5195><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Stone <S%G3036><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>

Being Aware <S%G4894><s%> They Fled <S%G2703><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lycaonia, <S%G3071><s%> Lystra, <S%G3082><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Derbe, <S%G1191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country Around, <S%G4066><s%>
And There <S%G2546><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings. <S%G2097><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Man <S%G435><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Lystra, <S%G3082><s%> Impotent <S%G102><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Feet, <S%G4228><s%> Sat, <S%G2521><s%> Lame <S%G5560><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> Of Mother <S%G3384><s%> His <S%G846><s%>, Being, <S%G5225><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Had Walked. <S%G4043><s%>

This Man <S%G3778><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Speaking, <S%G2980><s%> Who, <S%G3739><s%> Having Looked Intently <S%G816><s%> On Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Healed, <S%G4982><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> With A Loud <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice, <S%G5456><s%> Stand Up <S%G450><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Feet <S%G4675><s%> Upright. <S%G3717><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Sprang Up <S%G242><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walked. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Lifted Up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> In Lycaonian <S%G3072><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gods, <S%G2316><s%> Having Become Like <S%G3666><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Are Come Down <S%G2597><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G2564><s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They Called <S%G3303><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> Zeus; <S%G2203><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> Hermes, <S%G2060><s%> Because <S%G1894><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leader <S%G2233><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Speaking. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Priest <S%G2409><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zeus <S%G2203><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was <S%G5607><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%>, Their <S%G846><s%> Oxen <S%G5022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Garlands <S%G4725><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gates <S%G4440><s%> Having Brought, <S%G5342><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Wished <S%G2309><s%> To Sacrifice. <S%G2380><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Having Rent <S%G1284><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Garments, <S%G2440><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Rushed In <S%G1530><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Do Ye? <S%G4160><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Of Like Feelings <S%G3663><s%> Are <S%G2070><s%> With You <S%G5213><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To You <S%G5209><s%> From <S%G575><s%> These <S%G5130><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Vanities <S%G3152><s%> To Turn <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Living, <S%G2198><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Past <S%G3944><s%> Generations <S%G1074><s%> Suffered <S%G1439><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> To Go <S%G4198><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Own Ways, <S%G3598><s%> Their <S%G846><s%>

Though <S%G2532><s%> Indeed <S%G2544><s%> Not <S%G1065><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Without Witness <S%G267><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> He Left, <S%G863><s%>, Doing Good, <S%G15><s%> From Heaven <S%G3771><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> Rains <S%G5205><s%> Giving <S%G1325><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seasons <S%G2540><s%> Fruitful, <S%G2593><s%> Filling <S%G1705><s%> With Food <S%G5160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gladness <S%G2167><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Of Us. <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> Hardly <S%G3433><s%> They Stopped <S%G2664><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> From <S%G3588><s%> Sacrificing <S%G3361><s%> To <S%G2380><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1904><s%> Thither Came <S%G1161><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Persuaded <S%G3982><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Stoned <S%G3034><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> Drew Him <S%G4951><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> Supposing <S%G3543><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Have Died. <S%G2348><s%>

<S%G2944><s%> But Having Surrounded <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> He Went <S%G1831><s%> Away <S%G4862><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Derbe. <S%G1191><s%>

And Having Announced The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To <S%G5037><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G4172><s%> City, <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Discipled <S%G3100><s%> Many <S%G2425><s%> They Returned <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%>

Establishing <S%G1991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Exhorting Them <S%G3870><s%> To Continue <S%G1696><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Tribulations <S%G2347><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> We <S%G2248><s%> Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G5500><s%> And Having Chosen <S%G1161><s%> For Them <S%G846><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> ' In Every <S%G2596><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> Having Prayed <S%G4336><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Fastings <S%G3521><s%> They Committed <S%G3908><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Had Believed. <S%G4100><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pisidia <S%G4099><s%> They Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Pamphylia, <S%G3828><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Spoken <S%G2980><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Perga <S%G4011><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> They Came Down <S%G2597><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Attalia; <S%G825><s%>

And Thence <S%G2547><s%> They Sailed <S%G636><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> They Had <S%G2258><s%> Been Committed <S%G3860><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

<S%G3854><s%> And Having Arrived <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> They Declared <S%G312><s%> All That <S%G3745><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Opened <S%G455><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> A Door <S%G2374><s%> Of Faith. <S%G4102><s%>
<S%G1304><s%> And They Stayed <S%G1161><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> A Little <S%G3641><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
